frontmatter.title: Announcing Fluxstore 1.5
frontmatter.meta_title: FluxStore - Universal mobile commerce Flutter app for Magento, WooCommerce and Opencart
frontmatter.meta_description: Fluxstore is universal app that fully integration with the Woocommerce, Mangeto and Opencart

markdownRemark.html:
This version is an outstanding release that focuses to empower the app features for Magento and Opencart, some new UX.

Overview

  1. News ‚Äî native payment for Razopay, Paypal, Tap
  2. News ‚Äî compatible with XCode 11 and iOS 13
  3. News ‚Äî release Free WooCommerce config site
  4. News ‚Äî replace mstore-checkout by the plugin MStore API
  5. Update ‚Äî Facebook Login SDK 5.0
  6. Update ‚Äî add new series Youtube Channel to regular sharing tips.
  7. Update ‚Äî Migration guide and upgrade latest Flutter 1.9
  8. Road map for 1.6

1. Native payment for Razopay, Paypal, Tap

Current release support to work with new Native Payment Paypal, Razopay and Tap, this gateway is compatible for all WooCommerce, Magento and Opencart.

Please review this video for more detail on how to config the payments:

3. Support Flutter 1.9 andcompatible with XCode 11 and iOS 13

Please check this guide to know what‚Äôs new in Flutter 1.9

Flutter news from GDD China: uniting Flutter on web and mobile, and introducing Flutter 1.9This week is a big one for Flutter! Today, at Google Developer Days, our flagship conference for Chinese developers, we‚Ä¶developers.googleblog.com

Make sure to run the ‚Äúflutter upgrade‚Äù to update your new Flutter to the latest version, and download latest XCode 11 to test iOS 13.

4. Release Free WooCommerce config site

We make this pre-config site with all-ready-setup the plugins installed, setup the data config for WooCommerce site‚Ä¶ the Website is now for well maintain and up-to-date with latest WooCommerce and Wordpress.

inspireui/mstoreExtract the database file and change the wp-config.php to your database connection. Setup your virtual host and change‚Ä¶github.com

We hope this fresh Wordpress site config could help you save a lot of time when the first time setup the backend for the app, for more information about the setup please check the document.

FluxStore - Universal mobile commerce Flutter app for Magento, WooCommerce and OpencartThis setup is required your setup the Wordpress website with WooCommerce plugin, for more information about the‚Ä¶docs.inspireui.com

5. Replace mstore-checkout by the plugin MStore API

Our team has been working hard to pass the review from Wordpress Admin to publish the new plugins API, the new mstore-checkout plugins is now can be installed via the Wordpress plugins directory.

MStore APIThe plugin is used for config the Mstore/FluxStore mobile and support RestAPI to connect to the app. Fluxstore is a‚Ä¶wordpress.org

6. Facebook Login SDK 5.0

We upgraded the new Facebook library to latest flutter_facebook_login to latest 3.0 to support new 5.0 and prevent the WebviewUI warning from Appstore review.

If you are using previous Fluxstore 1.4 please note for this upgrade and change the login function:

final FacebookLoginResult result =
    await FacebookLogin().logIn(['email', 'public_profile']);

7. New Youtube Channel ‚ÄúFlutter E-Commerce App in 10 Minutes‚Äù

After release some previous FluxStore version, we have received a lot of positive feedbacks and questions how to customize the app more effective, we understand that is the problem when using the Flutter at the first time, that why we create this channel:

Inspire UIFluxstore is a universal e-commerce app inspired by Flutter framework. Website: https://inspireui.com/produ‚Ä¶www.youtube.com

Don‚Äôt forget to subscribe to this Youtube channel to get the latest sharing from the team, next videos we will cover topic about ‚ÄúHow to Customize the Fluxstore from scratch change menu, logo, map screens, delivery to appstore‚Ä¶‚Äù

9. Road map for 1.6

  • Please let us know if you have any Feature Request to our support Github
  • New 1.6 will be compatible with our FluxBuilder which will be released on the app store very soon, this is free for download, some mockup screenshots below üòä
